title: No Joke. Flood Insurance Rates Incease On April 1
teaser: Federal flood insurance premiums are going up on Wednesday. That means about a million people will see their premiums double. The rate increase is part of an effort to bring down the debt for  the program which subsidizes insurance for people living in flood zones.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
